sense.def:
Admission
je dovoljenje za vstop v prostor ali organizacijo, izdano osebi ali skupini oseb.

seg.quote: His Act tightened up the admission of immigrants into Britain.

sense.def:
The admission fee
je znesek, ki ga plačamo za vstop.

An admission
je izjava o resničnosti nečesa slabega, neprijetnega ali sramotnega.

seg.quote: He submitted his resignation, together with an admission of his guilt.
